definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="71" y="111"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_istamed_by"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tamedBy"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="random_integer"><value name="upper_bound"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:HedgehogSpiked</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">400</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
